import React from "react"; import {Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import MainTitle from "../MainTitle"; import ButtonCreate from "../ButtonCreate"; import MyCreateModal from "../MyCreateModal"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Personal.scss'; import {modalCreate, personalProps} from "../../services/mock"; import FormInput from "../FormInput"; const Personal = (props) => { const [modalCreateShow, setModalCreateShow] = React.useState(false); return (
{modalCreateShow && ( setModalCreateShow(false)} /> )}
) } export default Personal;
